name: FROSTBITTEN (itch)
description: [WASD or arrow keys to move] when you start walk around looking for 5 sticks to make a campfire for warmth but they are limited you can also create a spear to hunt arctic hares(arctic bunnies) for food and health to craft a spear you need 3 sticks like the campfire the spear is limited so keep making spears and campfires lets see how long you can survive good luck!
